page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: Ilfracombe is a small town but there are quite a few jobs that people can do. Such as farming, shop assistants and bar persons. These people get about Â£120.00 a week working everyday but some might not have to work on Sundays. They work about 8 hours a day especially shop assistants, but all that they have to do is sit and press buttons. I feel sorry for people that are unemployed because there is nothing to do except do the house work all the time. When you have a regular job and earn some money you can have a good time, but people who are unemployed don't get a lot of money. I think there are more people unemployed in the winter when many holiday jobs are lost. Then the unemployment level is 28% of the labour force.
